Questions.correct_ans_explanation: The Dalai Lama is a lama of the Gelug or "Yellow Hat" school of Tibetan Buddhism, founded by Tsongkhapa (1357–1419). The 14th and current Dalai Lama is Tenzin Gyatso, recognized since 1950.
Questions.wrong_ans_explanation: The Dalai Lama is a lama of the Gelug or "Yellow Hat" school of Tibetan Buddhism, founded by Tsongkhapa (1357–1419). The 14th and current Dalai Lama is Tenzin Gyatso, recognized since 1950.
Questions.question: Identify this famous personality.

Questions.correct_ans_explanation: Elizabeth II (Elizabeth Alexandra Mary; born 21 April 1926)[ is the Queen of 16 of the 53 member states in the Commonwealth of Nations. She is also Head of the Commonwealth and Supreme Governor of the Church of England.
